name: Tuna
description: Thunnus is a genus of ocean-dwelling ray-finned fish in the family Scombridae (tunas).

name: Salmon
description: Salmon is the common name for several species of ray-finned fish in the family Salmonidae.

name: Cod
description: Cod is the common name for the demersal fish genus Gadus

name: Mackerel
description: Mackerel is a common name applied to a number of different species of pelagic fish.

name: Sardine
description: Sardines are small coastal forage fish that feed on plankton.
